headline: A new Direction
description: A short, poetic meditation that questions the purpose of seeking once the great problems are solved. A pivot point wrapped in a whisper.
resonantThread: what remains when the quest is over
whyItMatters: This piece captures the subtle dread and liberation of a world with no more quests. It asks: If seeking ceases, where does the soul go?
articleExcerpt:
What happens if the answer to all the problems humans have ever found, is found?
what if there is nothing to seek?

Where would you look first?
